nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions

Interface LoanServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LoanService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoanServiceImpl

    public interface LoanServiceLocal
extends LoanService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

      • discardByExternalTransfer

        LoanPayment discardByExternalTransfer(Loan loan,
                                    ExternalTransfer externalTransfer)
                                      throws UnexpectedEntityException
        Discard the first open payment of the given loan, concealing with the given external transfer and returning it.
        Throws:
        UnexpectedEntityException - When the given loan has no open payments

      • grantForGuarantee

        Loan grantForGuarantee(GrantLoanDTO params,
                     boolean automaticAuthorization)
                       throws CreditsException,
                              AuthorizedPaymentInPastException
        Grants a loan from an accepted guarantee, returning it
        Throws:
        CreditsException - The loan cannot be granted because for either lack of funds or exceeding an upper credit limit
        AuthorizedPaymentInPastException - An authorized loan cannot be granted in past

        Inserts a loan in the current database transaction
